table.name: vtiger_rsnstatistics
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnstatistics` ( `rsnstatisticsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `stat_name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `relmodule` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnstatisticsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnstatisticscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnstatisticscf` ( `rsnstatisticsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnstatisticsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
